sentences.en: But the Lilliputian price also explains why Fannie Mae might have buy - and - hold types feeling queasy.
sentences.cn: 但是其股价如此低靡,也同样可以解释为什麽人们厌恶于 长期 持有房利美的股票.

sentences.en: He on bended knees entreats: " Lilliputian is Chen Quan, ask grandpa pardon. "
sentences.cn: 他便跪着请求道: “ 小人是陈全, 请公公饶恕. ”

sentences.en: In late January a Brobdingnagian battle erupted over a Lilliputian water dweller.
sentences.cn: 1月底,一种小小的水栖生物掀起了一场大战.

sentences.en: Lithographic tools for transferring Lilliputian circuitry onto a wafer cost up to $ 50 m a pop.
sentences.cn: 流行的用来移动微小电路到晶圆上的印刷工具价值5千万美元.

sentences.en: Several other little - known worlds are tucked into corners of this Lilliputian state.
sentences.cn: 另外还有几处不大为人所知的天地隐藏在这个“小人国”州的角落里.

trans.tran_en: extremely small compared to the normal size of things
